basics.name: Marsha Castello
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: I am an experienced Data Analyst, Masters Graduate, Microsoft Azure Certified,
PRINCE2 Practitioner, and Python Software Engineer Bootcamp Graduate.
Passionate advocate for sustainable and ethical technological innovation and AI & Machine Learning,
Committed to continuous professional development and a member of the professional bodies BCS, and CMI.
Projects I am currently deploying include: Azure DevOps IAC & CI/CD, Tableau, Python, Data and AI & Machine Learning Models.
Code First Girls alumni A Mentee at Cajigo 100 Women in Tech - Mentoring and Networking - Programme.
I am looking for Software / Data Engineering / DevOps opportunities.
